name: The Amplify Show Podcast
what_you_do: Emily Richett is a publicity and business coach who helps individuals redefine success and grow businesses rooted in their values through mentorship and media exposure.
who_you_serve: Emily serves millennial moms and entrepreneurs looking to start or grow a business while navigating motherhood and personal values.
signature_programs: Mama Bear Survival (book), Faith-Filled Business Mentorship
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: Upcoming book 'Mama Bear Survival', Faith-Filled Business Mentorship program
bio: Click Funnels' 2-Comma Club Award for earning over $1 million in a single sales funnel, featured in INC, Entrepreneur, Forbes, and various TV news stations.
business_focus: Emily Richett is a publicity and business coach who helps individuals redefine success and grow businesses rooted in their values through mentorship and media exposure. (publicity coaching)
